DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study was to assess the effect of 1) redesigned immunization card, 2) center-based education to mothers, and 3) redesigned card with center-based education to mothers, provided at DPT1, on DPT3 completion in a randomized controlled trial at rural Expanded Programme on Immunization (EPI) centers in Karachi, Pakistan.
DOC.brief_title: Low Cost Interventions to Improve Adherence to Childhood Immunization Schedule
DOC.criteria: All children visiting the selected EPI centers for DPT1 immunization Not residing in the same area for last six months.
